title: Error During Install
body:
When i tried to install alpha client over my live client, i got this error.
> Problem running post-install step. Installation may not complete correctly.
> No origin file found that matched E:/[Games]/League of Legends/RADS/project/League_client/releases/installer/deploy/League Client.exe

Note: I installed and used Alpha Client on PBE for a few weeks  and didn't get this error.

replies.body:
Hey dude,

I think the installer is having a hard time parsing your filepath because of the brackets in "[Game]". I tried it out on my machine and got the same error. Removing them fixed it although the installer is going to default to the same directory (because the registry is storing the old filepath and not updating it for whatever reason) so you're going to have to manually redirect it to the updated file path. 

Steps:
1. Remove brackets! [Game] --> Game
2. Launch Installer and observe that it still thinks the filepath with [Game] exists. Edit it by selecting your updated filepath clicking on the folder icon to the right on the text box and select your updated filepath
3. Run installer!

That should fix it but let me know if it doesn't. Happy Testing ^___^~

Thanks a lot, it's working now. My folder structure is now a bit less organized tho {{item:3070}} 
I hope they fix this error before final build. XD
